General_Description: '''Depleting Spartan Forces''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]]n [[Spartan army|militaries]] have too much power across the [[Greece|Greek world]]."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew numerous Spartan [[soldier]]s all over Greece, and was rewarded for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[The Red Harvest]] and [[Rooting Out Spartan Forces]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
